title: Strictly's Alex Scott looks chic in a LBD as she joins pro partner Neil Jones at It Takes Two
text:
They've become close since partnering up on Strictly Come Dancing.

And Alex Scott and Neil Jones shared each other's company once again on Thursday as they left the set of It Takes Two in London.

The England lioness, 35, was bright-eyed in a black dress and leather jacket as she walked with her professional dance partner, 37.

Cosy: Alex Scott and Neil Jones shared each other's company once again on Thursday as they left the set of It Takes Two in London

The footballer added to her dazzling look with bright red lipstick and hoop earrings, while her luscious jet black tresses hung over her shoulders in loose curls.

And Neil donned a funky shirt which he wore underneath a black blazer, with his chiseled beard drawing attention.

Their latest outing comes after Alex hilariously dropped Jones on his head on Wednesday following 13 hours of training.

The sporting ace descended into hysterics as she attempted a lift for the high-octane routine, but after losing her grip sent Neil, 37, collapsing onto the mat.

What a pair: The England lioness, 35, was bright-eyed in a black dress and leather jacket as she walked with her professional dance partner, 37

Luckily the British dancer was unharmed by the ordeal, as he soon got up and laughed along with his celebrity partner.

The pair only narrowly survived last week's elimination after finishing bottom of the leaderboard.

They were the last couple to be officially confirmed as safe during Sunday's results show, leaving viewers shocked that Dev Griffin and Dianne Buswell were in the dance-off.

Glammed up: The footballer added to her dazzling look with bright red lipstick and hoop earrings, while her luscious jet black tresses hung over her shoulders in loose curls

Trendy: Neil donned a funky shirt which he wore underneath a black blazer, with his chiseled beard drawing attention

Alex and Neil have grown close since being paired together on Strictly, and were even spotted heading back to her house following a night out last Friday.

It comes after Neil reportedly sparked a 'huge' backstage row with his ex Katya following Strictly's Movie Week.

The pro dancer was said to have been irked by Katya saying: 'I've never been better' after taking a tumble during her dance with partner Mike Bushell.

Progress: Alex and Neil finished at the bottom of the leaderboard last week and narrowly escaped the dance-off after they were the last couple revealed to be safe

Neil reportedly thought the comment was not about the fall and was instead a thinly-veiled dig at him following the demise of their marriage.

A source told The Sun: 'Just after filming finished, a huge fight broke out backstage between Katya and Neil.

'He thought what she said was a dig, and didn't appreciate it. He was really annoyed and told her so - but she denied it was anything to do with him.'

MailOnline contacted Strictly's representatives for comment at the time.
